author: Staff Reporter
text:
Coimbatore Corporation officials on Monday removed a snack bar that had come up near Saradha Shanmugam Road in Race Course.

According to sources, Mariappan, a differently abled person, had approached the district administration sometime ago seeking permission to erect a snack bar.

The administration forwarded the petition to the Coimbatore Corporation.

The officials forwarded the petition to the Central Zone officials, who permitted Mariappan to erect the snack bar near the sanitary inspector’s office in Race Course provided he had obtained no-objection certificate from other departments.

He then approached the Coimbatore City Police who accorded permission to erect the snack bar in another place in Race Course.

But when Mariappan erected the snack bar it was in a place that did not have the permission of either the corporation or the police.

Residents in the locality took objection to the snack bar.

They lodged a complaint with the authorities.
title: Snack outlet at Race Course removed
